paragraphs.content: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
paragraphs.contentHtml: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.

paragraphs.content: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.

paragraphs.content: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.

paragraphs.content: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.

paragraphs.content: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.

paragraphs.content: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.

paragraphs.content: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.

paragraphs.content: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
